timeline.bodyText: Just a recommendation for the code style. It should be concatName(String prefix...) (no space) and return prefix.concat('-' + suffix); (space between operator and operands). If you use Eclipse or IntelliJ IDEA, you can find IDE configuration here: https://github.com/kiegroup/droolsjbpm-build-bootstrap/tree/master/ide-configuration
timeline.author: MarianMacik

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the advice. I have code style imported in eclipse but apply it manually because some old files do not follow the format and the result of automatic formatting is messy. In this particular case and the previous one, I forgot to format manually.
replies.author: fjtirado
